text: Hey everyone, has anyone had experience with the google amp project in HubSpot? <http://www.ampproject.org|www.ampproject.org>

Hey <@U2H1Q3F8R>. AMP support was submitted on our Ideas forum (<http://ideas.HubSpot.com/forums/76407-general-HubSpot-ideas/suggestions/11714463-amp-html-support-for-blogposts>) and weâ€™re currently working on it. You can find some more info via the link above.
